Reviews.Title: “Beware - Hotel Might Give you a Confirmation, but Not a Room”

Reviews.Content: husband booked online hotel august 2011 stay october minor change reservation phone nights sent confirmation reservation noting changes imagine unpleasant surprise hotel 8 pm 1 3 5 tow told didnt confirmation email marriott reservation altered central booking spite confirmation email hand didnt sold front desk told call 800 else hour talking various people marriott told sorry mistake marriott free sent booked help try alternate night hotel fortunately computer able nearby hotel laquinta totally fine orbitz cant believe didnt help customer service terrible front desk person 800 line hotel called complain person pretty decent explained reservation messed instead fixing letting left didnt understand mistake occurred hotel call bonus elite rewards help stay definitely stay total incompetence hotel fine ive staying 2007 redesigned look courtyards staff people gone perks free coffee cookies lobby replaced unfriendly staff overpriced snack bar

Reviews.Title: “Clean rooms in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Soonipi
Reviews.Content: hotel location convenient highway minutes campus shopping mall hotels chain restaurants immediate highway noise disturbs doesnt interstate unusual courtyard property surprised king size onsite restaurantbar surprise resembled dining lobby residence inn ate elsewhere cant review food despite clean wellserviced day furnishings condition plenty hot water demand extra towels request coffee pot refrigerator bed acceptable computer lobby checkin flights print boarding passes complimentary coffee available morning hot water remainder day couldnt call value 3 nights homecoming weekend paid 100 night usual rate
